Episode.GuestStars: Persia White|Tupelo Jereme|Natalie Strauss|Brian Thompson|Ken Lerner|J. Patrick Lawlor|Eric Balfour|Deborah Brown|Carmine Giovinazzo|Amy Faith Chance|Julie Benz|Marc Metcalf|Kristine Sutherland|David Boreanaz
Episode.Overview: Determined to have a fresh start, Buffy Summers moves to Sunnydale only to find out that it's located on a Hellmouth and that her slaying duties have just begun.
